00037 #ifndef EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_
00038 #define EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_
00039 
00040 #include "egs_vector.h"
00041 #include "egs_base_source.h"
00042 #include "egs_rndm.h"
00043 #include "egs_alias_table.h"
00044

00047     #ifdef BUILD_SOURCE_COLLECTION_DLL
00048         #define EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)

00051     #endif
00052     #define EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_LOCAL

00065 
00083 class EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_EXPORT EGS_SourceCollection :
00084     public EGS_BaseSource {
00085 
00086 public:
00087 
00093     EGS_SourceCollection(const vector<EGS_BaseSource *> &S,
00094                          const vector<EGS_Float> &prob,
00095                          const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00096         EGS_BaseSource(Name,f), nsource(0), count(0) {
00097         setUp(S,prob);
00098     };
00099 
00104     EGS_SourceCollection(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00105     ~EGS_SourceCollection() {
00106         if (nsource > 0) {
00107             for (int j=0; j<nsource; j++) {
00108                 EGS_Object::deleteObject(sources[j]);
00109             }
00110             delete [] sources;
00111             delete table;
00112             delete [] p;
00113             delete [] last_cases;
00114         }
00115     };
00116 
00117     EGS_I64 getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00118                             int &q, int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt,
00119                             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00120         int j = table->sampleBin(rndm);
00121         EGS_I64 this_case = sources[j]->getNextParticle(rndm,q,latch,E,wt,x,u);
00122         count += this_case - last_cases[j];
00123         last_cases[j] = this_case;
00124         return count;
00125     };
00126     EGS_Float getEmax() const {
00127         return Emax;
00128     };
00129     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00130         EGS_Float flu = 0;
00131         for (int j=0; j<nsource; j++) {
00132             flu += sources[j]->getFluence();
00133         }
00134         return flu;
00135     };
00136     bool storeState(ostream &data) const {
00137         bool res = EGS_BaseSource::storeState(data);
00138         if (!res) {
00139             return res;
00140         }
00141         res = egsStoreI64(data,count);
00142         if (!res) {
00143             return res;
00144         }
00145         data << " ";
00146         for (int j=0; j<nsource; j++) {
00147             res = egsStoreI64(data,last_cases[j]);
00148             if (!res) {
00149                 return res;
00150             }
00151             data << " ";
00152             if (!sources[j]->storeState(data)) {
00153                 return false;
00154             }
00155         }
00156         return true;
00157     };
00158     bool setState(istream &data) {
00159         bool res = EGS_BaseSource::setState(data);
00160         if (!res) {
00161             return res;
00162         }
00163         res = egsGetI64(data,count);
00164         if (!res) {
00165             return res;
00166         }
00167         for (int j=0; j<nsource; j++) {
00168             res = egsGetI64(data,last_cases[j]);
00169             if (!res) {
00170                 return res;
00171             }
00172             if (!sources[j]->setState(data)) {
00173                 return false;
00174             }
00175         }
00176         return true;
00177     }
00178 
00179     void resetCounter() {
00180         EGS_BaseSource::resetCounter();
00181         count = 0;
00182         for (int j=0; j<nsource; ++j) {
00183             last_cases[j] = 0;
00184             sources[j]->resetCounter();
00185         }
00186     };
00187 
00188     virtual bool addState(istream &data_in) {
00189         EGS_I64 tmp;
00190         bool res = EGS_BaseSource::addState(data_in);
00191         if (!res) {
00192             return res;
00193         }
00194         res = egsGetI64(data_in,tmp);
00195         if (!res) {
00196             return res;
00197         }
00198         count += tmp;
00199         for (int j=0; j<nsource; j++) {
00200             res = egsGetI64(data_in,tmp);
00201             if (!res) {
00202                 return res;
00203             }
00204             last_cases[j] += tmp;
00205             if (!sources[j]->addState(data_in)) {
00206                 return false;
00207             }
00208         }
00209         return true;
00210     };
00211 
00212     bool isValid() const {
00213         return (nsource > 0);
00214     };
00215 
00216 protected:
00217 
00218     int nsource;
00219     EGS_BaseSource **sources;  
00220     EGS_AliasTable *table;     
00221     EGS_I64        *last_cases;
00222     EGS_Float      *p;         
00223     EGS_Float Emax;            
00224     EGS_I64        count;      
00225 
00226     void setUp(const vector<EGS_BaseSource *> &S, const vector<EGS_Float> &);
00227 
00228 };
00229 
00230 #endif
